name: We've Come Too Far To Live In The Past - EP
description: The long awaited physical format is here! Order today! 1. You Are: Convenience - 2:38 2. 1968 - 2:53 3. Blindfolds - 3:02 4. Mark My Words - 3:15 5. We've Come Too Far To Live In The Past- 3.46 "10/10!" - Soundscape Magazine "There are very few bands these days that you can hear the passion coming through with each note played and every melody sang. Hearts Under Fire have mastered this art in their newest release, We’ve Come Too Far To Live In The Past. The five song EP is filled with amazing musicianship and great songwriting. 5/5!" - Wordkrapht "It’s such a refreshing change for girls to be singing about taking control rather than just playing the heartbroken victim" - showmesomethingdifferent.com "HUF have managed to step it all up another gear with We've Come Too Far To Live In The Past. 5/5 " - Ears to The Ground "‘We’ve Come Too Far To Live In The Past’ is an EP bursting with exuberance and contrasting dark undertones that work together to create the sound of Hearts Under Fire. All elements of the songs come across sharp and punchy with attitude and girl power spirit, creating powerful punk rock songs. The more I listen to it, the more I enjoy it and the powerful edge the girls put across, whether it be through their riffs or lyrics, tone or contrast, Hearts Under Fire have learnt how to write a dominant EP." - Punk Prospect
